meanings: slap an adult in the face

phrases.phrase: 어른 말을 들으면 자다가도 떡이 생긴다
meanings: You will get tteok, rice cake, if you listen to what elders say

vlive.korean: 더 어른스러워지고 그런... So I want to become more mature. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] "고오급 TMI 티키타카" (한결, 도현 : H&D)
vlive.english: So I want to become more mature.

vlive.korean: 되게 뭔가 저한테는 엄청 어른 같은 느낌이었거든요? in their mid-20s were real adults. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 오주년이 얼마 안남아따
vlive.english: in their mid-20s were real adults.

vlive.korean: 또 어른 이거 하면 캐럿들 놀리는 거 아니야? If I say adult, wouldn't CARAT make fun of me? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 🦦 Happy Dino Day 🦖
vlive.english: If I say adult, wouldn't CARAT make fun of me?

vlive.korean: [치명 열매 과다 섭취 어디서 어른 냄새 안 나나요...?] [Too much sexiness. Can you see the grown-up man?] View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) OFFLINE #1
vlive.english: [Too much sexiness. Can you see the grown-up man?]

vlive.korean: 단발로는 처음 입는 'Hi High' 옷입니다 - 어른이 된! This is "Hi High" outfit that I wore for the first time with my short hair. - Became an adult! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [MULTI/VERSE_BEHIND] 이달의 소녀(LOONA) 'Hi High'편 (👋🏼)
vlive.english: This is "Hi High" outfit that I wore for the first time with my short hair. - Became an adult!

examples.korean: Children have no respect for their elders nowadays. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 요즘에는 아이들이 어른들에 대한 존경심이 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Children have no respect for their elders nowadays. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This particular breed of cattle matures early. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 특정 종자의 소는 빨리 어른 소가 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This particular breed of cattle matures early. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a mature and sensible attitude 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어른스럽고 분별 있는 태도 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Each ticket admits one adult. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 표 한 장으로 어른 한 명이 입장할 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Each ticket admits one adult. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Jane is very mature for her age. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 제인은 나이에 비해 아주 어른스럽다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
